did.unittitle: Esther Willits and Esther Thomas papers

bioghist.p: Esther Evans Willits (1874-1975) was a graduate student at Bryn Mawr College in Physics and Biology from 1894 to 1896 and held the Foundation Scholarship. She was a member of the Committee on Friends' Primary School from 1905 to 1913. She married Arthur Henry Thomas, founder of the Arthur H. Thomas Company, in 1898. Their daughter, Esther Thomas, graduated from Bryn Mawr in 1931.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of course notebooks and correspondence of Esther Willets Thomas, primarily from her husband, Arthur Thomas. There are also several letters from Arthur Thomas to their daughter, Esther Thomas, and a handful of printed Bryn Mawr programs.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
